original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND p.AnswerCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-11 21:46:02' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=642 AND u.DownVotes>=0
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.AnswerCount >= 0 AND posts.CommentCount >= 0
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-11 21:46:02'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E2E3.OwnerUserId=E5.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E5E4 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E2E3E5.Id=E4.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 642 AND users.DownVotes >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3E5E4E6 AS SELECT * FROM E2E3E5E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E2E3E5E4.OwnerUserId=E6.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3E5E4E6 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3E5E4E6 WHERE E1.PostId=E2E3E5E4E6.Id)
